programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Moving Experience
programme.desc: Moving an entire wood shop is no fun. But you can save yourself a lot of backaches if you hire some help. Money well-spent if you ask me. I'll show you everything I did to get my shop ready for the road trip. By no means is this meant to be a guide of any sort. Rather, its just a peek into my personal experience. And if you ever have to move your own shop, you’ll know what you’re in for.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Miter Gauge that Does One Angle?!
programme.desc: Woodpeckers new Exact-90 Miter Gauge only cuts one angle and costs a bundle, but there's more than meets the eye here.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Fancy Raised Panel
programme.desc: As much as I would love to show you all the details of my current project, time just won’t allow it. But there is one specific part of the process I wanted to show you: making the raised panels.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Fancy Breadbox
programme.desc: This ain't your grandma's bread box!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Deep Red Mahogany Finish
programme.desc: A deep red mahogany finish doesn’t have to be the result of a complicated process. I’ll show you how I use a simple two-step method to revitalize my mother in law’s old beat up rocking char. First, a coat of General Finishes Merlot Water-Based Dye. Second, a coat of General Finishes Brown Mahogany Gel Stain. Its all finished off with a nice satin lacquer topcoat.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Classic Picture Frame
programme.desc: A classic picture frame for a special piece of art.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Better Way to Apply Oil Finishes!
programme.desc: Applying oil finishes sparingly is the key to avoiding problems with curing and other flaws in the surface.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Backlit LED Poster Frame Light Box
programme.desc: Nicole and I love movies and we are lucky to have our own home theater room. Just outside that room, is a recess with an outlet on the wall intended for a back-lit poster frame. The one that came with the house was made with fluorescent tubes and was falling apart. So this is my replacement. It features a dimmable LED light strip and a double-sided poster and accEPts 27″ x 40″ posters.

programme.desc: Learn how to alter any jacket into a perfect fit with Mary Beth!

programme.desc: Watch Mary Beth make a simple dress form for sewing.

programme.title: All Free Sewing: No Sew Fabric Flowers
programme.desc: Mary Beth shows how to make easy fabric flowers for decoration.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Colorful and Easy Beaded Necklace
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Learn how to easily make a colorful beaded necklace with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Traveler's Map DIY Coasters
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Make awesome traveler's map coasters with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Cupcake Liner Flower Frame and Scrabble Tile Frame Art
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Decorate your picture frames with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: How to Make a Cardboard Mailbox
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Learn how to make a cute cardboard mailbox with Stephenie.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: DIY Wall Art - Sharpie Inspired Watercolor and Recycled Craft Magazine
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Learn how to make cool wall art with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Rainbow Tie Dye Shoes
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Learn how to tie-dye shoes with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Recycled Water Bottle Bracelet
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Make a bracelet from a simple water bottle with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: DIY Tie Dye Hoodie
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Learn how to easily tie-dye your hoodie with Tanner.

programme.title: All Free Kids Crafts: Pool Noodle Lightsaber DIY Craft
programme.desc: Crafts for kids! Make super cool lightsabers out of pool noodles with Tanner.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Pottery in Pench
programme.desc: Learn everything about Pottery. It's ancient history and evolution with time.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Nagpur Handicraft
programme.desc: Take a tour of the main design factory of Nagpur to learn how the local artisans make beautiful wooden handicrafts.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Paper Mache
programme.desc: Bihar's paper mache masters teach how to make unique crafts with paper mache technique.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Jharokha Art
programme.desc: Indian Jharokha art master Mohini Gupta teaches how to make a beautiful art piece using this unique technique.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: The Art of Indian Canvas Painting
programme.desc: Explore the Art of Canvas Painting with nationally acclaimed artist Amit Dutt, winner of the Indian National Academy Award, Bombay Art Society All India Award and many other prestige awards for his unique canvases. Go on a journey with the renowned Indian painter and watch the art happen.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Kitschy Kool
programme.desc: Joined by embroidery rock star Jenny Hart, Wendy shows us stylist ways to tie the French knot and turns an old rotary phone into a hip timekeeper.

programme.title: She's Crafty: All Things "L"
programme.desc: Lamp shade made from vintage slides; leather cuff purse; stylish mail organizer.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Livin' Tha Life
programme.desc: Divide up your room in style with a stunning room divider. Take a spare t-shirt and give an old chair a mod makeover. Plus give your pad a hot new vibe with this lamp made from plastic cups.

programme.title: She's Crafty: 21st Century Craft
programme.desc: Crafting a used table into a hip ottoman and an old school audio cassette into a funky business card holder.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Chillaxin'
programme.desc: Crafting up bedside tables and lap desk; turning old cigar box into a jewelry box.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Style Galore
programme.desc: Recycle a garage-sale lamp and turn into an outdoorsy design. Plus, have fun with collage. Create a gorgeous art journal.

programme.title: She's Crafty: Take It Outside
programme.desc: Tie-dye wall art and handmade picture frames!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Cleaning Dados with a Router Plane
programme.desc: One of my all-time favorite hand tools is the router plane. However, I very rarely use it to create joinery. In my shop, its sole purpose is fine-tuning. The blade can be set at a fixed distance from the base so it is incredibly effective at creating dados and grooves of a consistent depth.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Sweet Bandsaw Upgrade
programme.desc: A close look at the installation and use of the Laguna DriftMaster Fence System.
